string-array.name: descriptions
string-array.item: Keep track of shared expenses with friends and never let money come between great relationships.
See who owes you and who you owe at a glance. Stay on top of your finances effortlessly.
Create groups for trips, roommates, or any shared expenses. Split bills fairly with multiple friends.
Record payments and settle balances with just a few taps. Everyone stays happy and in the loop.
